text: Last August, Tamra Judge confirmed that she had been diagnosed with melanoma. But what fans may not realize is that The Real Housewives of Orange County fitness guru learned about the skin cancer diagnosis after an interesting incident that took place during that unforgettable group trip to Iceland during Season 12. ` ` I go to the dermatologist a lot and I had had this mark on the side of my butt for a long time. And I didn't think anything of it. I didn't even think to show it to her'cause it was just a little freckle,'' she recently told The Daily Dish. ` ` And we were in Iceland last year filming and I was getting a massage.
